about_the_game:
THE SONG OF THE NIGHTRIDER presents SHADOWCATCHING


STORY

Cursed nightfall not only transforms most living creatures into shadows but also traps their souls in the form of floating sound orbs, which contain their precious magic. From age to age sound witches and shadowcatchers have therefore ventured out into the dark to wake up and steal from the Nightrider's dangerous realm.

GAMEPLAY

This demo let's you experience a totally new form of interactive music. The rhythmic gameplay is challenging by design and best played with a game controller (keyboard/mouse control is supported too). While the final gameplay of THE SONG OF THE NIGHTRIDER will combine your SHADOWCATCHING talents with delicate fencing skills, the power of battle music and the use of game items like sound traps, this gameplay demo deliberately focuses on its acoustic potential. Therefore the noise level display and the threat of discovery by the Nightrider remain deactivated.

DEMO

This demo includes one stage with three increasing difficulty levels (mist/rain/snow). Each level requires more musical attention than the last one till you attain the skills of a true sound witch and have reached the actual game difficulty. So be warned: Your cute opponent may become frustrating deadly if you don't learn to trust your ears and head the hints in the sound design as well as the few tutorial instructions.


TECHNICAL NOTES

To play this acoustic gameplay demo (developed exclusively for PC) we recommend sufficient gaming performance. Otherwise, the implemented rhythmic control system may not run smoothly and the gameplay experience suffer greatly. So please check system requirements carefully before downloading the demo. And thank you for remembering: This is a demo of a game in early development. Some bugs may appear, so why not be prepared to take advantage of them?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windwos 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / AMD 3200g 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that DirectX-Version 11 is required for tessalation. Furthermore the minimum system requirements base on the free-to-play gameplay demo and do NOT correspond to the system requirements of the future full version of the game.

short_description: With sunset the Nightrider not only transforms all creatures into shadows but also traps their souls in the form of floating sound orbs, which contain their precious magic. From age to age sound witches have therefore snuck out into the darkness to wake up and steal the forbidden gifts of the Night.
